item0.name: Trinity Force
item0.description:
30 Attack Damage
30% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 0 Attack Speed.

item1.name: Navori Quickblades
item1.description:
60 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
30 Ability Haste
  • Deft Strikes: Your critical strikes with Attacks reduce your non-Ultimate Ability cooldowns by 20% of their remaining cooldown.

item2.name: Plated Steelcaps
item2.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item3.name: Control Ward
item3.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

item0.name: Trinity Force
item0.description:
30 Attack Damage
30% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 0 Attack Speed.

item1.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item1.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Corrupting Potion
item5.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 0 Attack Speed.

item1.name: Ravenous Hydra
item1.description:
65 Attack Damage
20 Ability Haste
10% Omnivamp
  • Cleave: Attacks and Abilities deal up to (60% Attack Damage) physical damage to other enemies near target hit.

    Deals a minimum of (12% Attack Damage) damage to units at the end of its range, can only hit each target once per Attack or Ability, and doesn't trigger off of periodic damage.

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.name: Phage
item3.description:
15 Attack Damage
200 Health
  • Sturdy: After you deal physical damage to a champion, restore 2% max Health over 6 seconds.

    Restoration reduced to 50% for Ranged users.

item5.name: Corrupting Potion
item5.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

item1.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
10% Life Steal

item1.name: Stopwatch
item1.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

item0.name: Essence Reaver
item0.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals an additional 100% Base Attack Damage + 40% Bonus Attack Damage physical damage On-Hit and restores 40% of that damage as mana (1.5s cooldown).

item1.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item1.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item2.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
10% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15-35 Attack Damage for 8s (90s ).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item3.name: Control Ward
item3.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.

  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

45 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals an additional 100% Base Attack Damage + 40% Bonus Attack Damage physical damage On-Hit and restores 40% of that damage as mana (1.5s cooldown).

item2.name: Corrupting Potion
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item1.name: Trinity Force
item1.description:
30 Attack Damage
30% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 0 Attack Speed.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

item5.name: Serpent's Fang
item5.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
  • Shield Reaver: Dealing damage to an enemy champion reduces any shields they gain by (50% | 25% for Ranged Champions) for 3 seconds. When you damage an enemy who is unaffected by Shield Reaver, reduce all shields on them by (50% | 25% for Ranged Champions).

    Additional damage not applied to targets with shields that only block magic damage.
    Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.
